events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this product is not what I paid for.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to receiving the wrong item, thus categorizing this case under Refund.
Support agent Amy has been assigned to handle the refund case regarding the wrong product delivery reported by the customer.
Hello! I’m Amy, here to help you with your refund request. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund quickly?
Thank you for the quick response. My order number is 987654321, and I attached a photo showing the item received which is not what I ordered.
We have reviewed your photo and order details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for resolving this so quickly. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund.
The refund case is now closed with the refund being processed. We appreciate your patience and apologize for the inconvenience.
Just following up to confirm you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
As confirmed, the refund was fully processed. We are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support.
